name: Bread Pudding
steps: Break bread into pieces/stir with butter. Put into a 9 x 13 in buttered pan. Mix other ingredients pour over top. Mush it all down. Bake at 300 for 40 min.
Sauce: Mix together starting with corn syrup all ingredients and bring to a boil. While boiling add 1 1/3-1 1/2 cream. Remove from heat and let stand.
